Package ssc

Class Summary
RestfulClient This is our restful client used be Sense Smart City.
SenseSmartCity This library is the client side of Sense Smart City.
Sensor This is a Sensor in SSC.
SnowPressure Container for a reading of type SnowPressure.
SSCPosition Represent a position in SSC.
SSCResources Collection of all constant values used for communication with Sense Smart City and management of data.
SSCResources.Field Static class Field The return value from Sense Smart City comes in two flavors xml or JSON.
SSCResources.Query This is the keys for the query string following the url.
SSCResources.Url A url is build up of two parts, a absolute base url and a relative Url.
SSCTimeUnit Date and time is always in the format yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss, example '1987-01-23 18:19:34'.
 

Enum Summary
SSCResources.DeployedState Enumerator DeployedState A senor have a state of deployment.
SSCResources.Period Enumerate Period All possible values for key PERIOD in request.
SSCResources.TypeName Enumerator TypeName Every sensor is of a given type.
 

Exception Summary
SSCException A runtime exception wrapper for all well know exceptions.
SSCException.ClientError Restful client, in case of response code 4xx.
SSCException.ConnectionFailed Restful client failed to establish connection with server.
SSCException.MalformedData Malformed data exception is throw then data is in wrong form.
SSCException.Mystery Exception at places no exception is expected
SSCException.NoUserCredentials In order to get data from server user credentials is mandatory.
SSCException.ServerError Restful client, in case of response code 5xx.
